Package hackaton.fastdisision.service

Interface AcceptVoteFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcceptVoteFacadeImpl
    public interface AcceptVoteFacade
    Service to accept vote for voting and votingOption
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Dmitrochenkov Daniil

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      VoteOption acceptVote​(User user, java.lang.Long optionId, java.lang.String votedIp, java.lang.String votingKey)
      Accept new vote to voting

    • Method Detail

      • acceptVote

        VoteOption acceptVote​(User user,
                      java.lang.Long optionId,
                      java.lang.String votedIp,
                      java.lang.String votingKey)
               throws VotingAccessException,
                      VoteException
        Accept new vote to voting
        Parameters:
        user - voted user
        optionId - voted option ID in voting
        votedIp - IP which sent vote
        votingKey - voting key from client
        Returns:
        updated voting option
        Throws:
        VotingAccessException - if voting key is invalid
        VoteException - if voting accept only one vote per IP and votedIp already vote
        See Also:
        VoteOption, Voting
